ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: except for him who is to roast in the Blazing Fire.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Except one who is (destined) to burn in Hell.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: except him who shall roast in the Blazing Fire.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: except those who are doomed to enter hell.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Except the one who will go into the blazing fire.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Except those who are predestined to burn in Hell!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Save him who will go to hell.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: except him who shall roast in Hell.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Save him who is to burn in hell.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: except those who will burn in Hell.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Save him Who is to roast in the Flaming Fire.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: except someone who is bound for hell.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Except such as are (themselves) going to the blazing Fire!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Except those who are predestined to burn in Hell!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: except for he who shall roast in Hell.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Except for he who will be roasting in Hell.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Except he who is to [enter and] burn in the Hellfire.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [37:163]   except him who will burn in Hell, in God’s knowledge, exalted be He.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Save him who is to burn in hell) save him who will enter hell with you, i.e. Iblis; it is also said that this means: except he whom I decreed that he will enter hell with you.
